Replace.Text: +6 [ICON_FAITH] Faith. A building unique to Khmer. Replaces the Temple. Required to purchase Apostles and Inquisitors with [ICON_Faith] Faith. +0.5 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every [ICON_CITIZEN] population in this city. Once Flight is researched receive +10 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism if the city [ICON_CITIZEN] population is 10 or higher and +20 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism if the city [ICON_CITIZEN] population is 20 or higher. 15% discount on purchasing Warrior Monks. Warrior Monks gain a free promotion.
